DOC.brief_summary: To study impact genetic environmental factor high-level cognition associate neural circuit among healthy young Chinese Han subject .
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator plan collect behavioral assessment environmental factor data , peripheral blood sample , MRI brain image 10,000 healthy young Chinese Han individual order build pathway gene high-level cognitive phenotype .
DOC.criteria: aged 1830 Chinese Han righthanded without history neuropsychiatric disease substance addiction smoking young elder 1830 yearold ethnic history neuropsychiatric disease history neuropsychiatric disease among first , second third degree relative
